original_title: Seme - Schlage nicht, um zu gewinnen. Gewinne, dann schlage
overview: Kendo is for Taejon, the center of life. But as soon as he has put down the armor, everyday life catches up with him. Since the death of his mother, Taejon must help out in the small Korean restaurant of the parents. He and his father have nearly stopped talking to each other. But the calm is deceptive. Soon, Taejon notices that he has to face up to things. Just like for a fight.
title: Seme - Schlage nicht, um zu gewinnen. Gewinne, dann schlage
